page.title: 04LAW AND ORDER
page.content: {GIRVAN}Police Force consists of one Chief Inspector,four Inspectors and fifteen Constables.{GIRVAN}has no traffic police but does have one Sherpa van and one saloon car. Minor offences are dealt with in the local magistrates' court whilst more serious crimes would go before the Sheriff at Ayr.The only recent serious crime was murder. A potentially serious situation involving scooters was quickly brought under control,the first time this has been experienced in {GIRVAN.} The commonest offences are theft and assault.This year(1985) part of GIRVAN Primary School was burned down.This is believed to have been one of the oldest educational establishments in SCOTLAND.
